mapper.select: /* 국내 프로그램 - 제휴 사례 목록 조회 */ /* 메인 비주얼 조회 */ SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER , AFFILIATE_PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT AFFI.AFFILIATE_SN AS AFFILIATE_SN , AFFI.SRVC_NM AS SRVC_NM , AFFI.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , AFFI.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.FILE_NM AS AFFILIATE_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS AFFILIATE_PATH FROM KB_AFFILIATE_INFO AFFI , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE AFFI.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) ORDER BY AFFILIATE_SN ASC ) AFFILIATE_PAGE ORDER BY ROWNUMBER DESC

/* 국내 프로그램 - 제휴 사례 상세 조회 */ SELECT AFFI.AFFILIATE_SN AS AFFILIATE_SN , AFFI.AFFILIATE_NM AS AFFILIATE_NM , AFFI.STARTER_NM AS STARTER_NM , AFFI.SRVC_NM AS SRVC_NM , AFFI.CTGRY_NM AS CTGRY_NM , AFFI.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , AFFI.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , AFFI.ATCH_FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS AFFILIATE_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS AFFILIATE_PATH FROM KB_AFFILIATE_INFO AFFI , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE AFFI.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND AFFI.AFFILIATE_SN = #{affiliate_sn}
